name: Anima: Gate of Memories - The Nameless Chronicles
description: Anima The Nameless Chronicles is a third person action RPG that tells the story of a man without name, an immortal being cursed to walk the world until the end of time. When a shadow of his past rises again in his path, he will be forced to take part in a conflict in which the very existence is in question. But...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Dual Core processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Compatible with DirectX9 with 512 MB RAM or better (NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 / ATI Radeon HD 5850 ) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Quad core processor Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 6 GB available space
